title: make: Permission denied error
body:
getting this error while building rust with

```
./configure --target=arm-unknown-linux-gnueabihf --prefix=/home/vagrant/rust-pi/rust && make && make install

==> default: cfg: version 1.9.0-dev (e4e8b6668 2016-05-18)
==> default: cfg: build triple x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
==> default: cfg: host triples x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
==> default: cfg: target triples x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu arm-unknown-linux-gnueabihf
==> default: cfg: non-build target triples arm-unknown-linux-gnueabihf
==> default: cfg: host for x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu is x86_64
==> default: cfg: host for arm-unknown-linux-gnueabihf is arm
==> default: cfg: os for x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu is unknown-linux-gnu
==> default: cfg: os for arm-unknown-linux-gnueabihf is unknown-linux-gnueabihf
==> default: cfg: have good valgrind for x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
==> default: cfg: no good valgrind for arm-unknown-linux-gnueabihf
==> default: cfg: using CC=gcc (CFG_CC)
==> default: cfg: disabling valgrind run-pass tests
==> default: cfg: including prepare rules
==> default: cfg: including dist rules
==> default: cfg: including install rules
==> default: Makefile:189: /root/rust-pi/rust-src/mk/util.mk: Permission denied

==> default: Makefile:207: /root/rust-pi/rust-src/mk/docs.mk: Permission denied
==> default: Makefile:209: /root/rust-pi/rust-src/mk/llvm.mk: Permission denied
==> default: Makefile:211: /root/rust-pi/rust-src/mk/debuggers.mk: Permission denied

==> default: cfg: including install rules
==> default: Makefile:252: /root/rust-pi/rust-src/mk/install.mk: Permission denied
==> default: make: stat: /root/rust-pi/rust-src/mk/install.mk: Permission denied

==> default: make: stat: /root/rust-pi/rust-src/mk/util.mk: Permission denied

==> default: make: *** [install] Error 2
==> default: /home/vagrant
```
